description: These simple steak tacos are easy to prepare and ready in a flash. A summer favourite, these tacos are perfect for casual entertaining.
keywords: Taco,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Lemon Mustard Steak And Roast Corn Tacos Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Coat sirloin steaks with MasterFoodsTM Dijon Mustard.
Pan fry the steaks in butter with some sliced shallots. When the steaks are cooked to your liking and add the squeeze of one lime. Let it sit for 5 minutes off the heat.
Cut corn off the cob and drizzle with olive oil and salt. Cook the corn in an oven at 200 degrees for 10 minutes.
Place the steaks whole on a wooden cutting board, and serve with the roasted corn, sprigs of coriander, sliced avocado, steamed tortillas, and fresh lime wedges.
